2001-3264 (La. 10/25/02)

STATE ex rel. Troy KNIGHT v. STATE of Louisiana. No. 2001-KH-3264. Supreme Court of Louisiana. Oct. 25, 2002.

In re Knight, Troy; — Plaintiff; Applying for Supervisory and/or Remedial Writs, Parish of E. Baton Rouge, 19th Judicial District Court Div. J, No. 1-94-316; to the Court of Appeal, First Circuit, No. 2001 KW 1047.

Denied.
